flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: You will learn how to implement a VHDL implementation of a subset of the MIPS architecture.
guide.introduction_rendered: You will learn how to implement a VHDL implementation of a subset of the MIPS architecture.
guide.summary: This is a step by step description of how to MIPS implementation.
guide.title: Implementing MIPS on Xilinx Parts
